name: Unblock It - Challenge your brain
description:
"Unblock It - Challenge your brain" is a simple and addictive sliding block puzzle game.

* HOW TO PLAY:
- Horizontal blocks can be moved only side-wards
- Vertical blocks can be moved up and down
- Move the red block to the exit

The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way.
This is the best puzzle game to boost up your mind with more than 300+ puzzles to solve.
Unblock Me helps you to train your brain and keep you mentally fit with various puzzles.
This top puzzle game is for kids and adults of all ages, play by yourself or challenge your buddies and compare your moves.
No matter in which part of the world you are now, just install our block puzzle game and start having the fun
